name: WrappedClassInstance$MethodSigParts
description: A utility class that parses and represents components of Java method signatures.
overview:
The `MethodSigParts` class serves as a parser and container for JVM method signatures in their internal format. It breaks down complex method signatures into their constituent components, making it easier to work with method metadata, perform type checking, and resolve method calls accurately.

It supports the JVM's internal method signature format, where object types are denoted by `Lpackage/ClassName;`, primitives by single letters (e.g., `Z` for boolean, `I` for int), and arrays by `[`.

constructors.description: Creates a new MethodSigParts instance by parsing the provided JVM method signature string.

methods.name: get
methods.description: Retrieves the full formatted method signature string.

methods.name: getOriginal
methods.description: Retrieves the original raw signature string used to create this instance.

methods.name: getReturnType
methods.description: Retrieves the return type component of the signature in JVM format.

methods.name: getParameters
methods.description: Retrieves an array of parameter types in JVM format.

methods.name: getParameterCount
methods.description: Retrieves the number of parameters defined in the method signature.
